an5.48:1.1: “Pancimani, bhikkhave, alabbhaniyani thanani samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmim.
an5.48:1.3: ‘Jaradhammam ma jiri’ti alabbhaniyam thanam samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmim.
an5.48:1.4: ‘Byadhidhammam ma byadhiyi’ti …pe… ‘maranadhammam ma miyi’ti … ‘khayadhammam ma khiyi’ti … ‘nassanadhammam ma nassi’ti alabbhaniyam thanam samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmim.
an5.48:2.2: So jaradhamme jinne na iti patisancikkhati:
an5.48:2.3: ‘na kho mayhevekassa jaradhammam jirati, atha kho yavata sattanam agati gati cuti upapatti sabbesam sattanam jaradhammam jirati.
an5.48:2.4: Ahanceva kho pana jaradhamme jinne soceyyam kilameyyam parideveyyam, urattalim kandeyyam, sammoham apajjeyyam, bhattampi me nacchadeyya, kayepi dubbanniyam okkameyya, kammantapi nappavatteyyum, amittapi attamana assu, mittapi dummana assu’ti.
an5.48:2.5: So jaradhamme jinne socati kilamati paridevati, urattalim kandati, sammoham apajjati.
an5.48:2.7: ‘assutava puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena attanamyeva paritapeti’.
an5.48:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, assutavato puthujjanassa byadhidhammam byadhiyati …pe… maranadhammam miyati … khayadhammam khiyati … nassanadhammam nassati.
an5.48:3.2: So nassanadhamme natthe na iti patisancikkhati:
an5.48:3.3: ‘na kho mayhevekassa nassanadhammam nassati, atha kho yavata sattanam agati gati cuti upapatti sabbesam sattanam nassanadhammam nassati.
an5.48:3.4: Ahanceva kho pana nassanadhamme natthe soceyyam kilameyyam parideveyyam, urattalim kandeyyam, sammoham apajjeyyam, bhattampi me nacchadeyya, kayepi dubbanniyam okkameyya, kammantapi nappavatteyyum, amittapi attamana assu, mittapi dummana assu’ti.
an5.48:3.5: So nassanadhamme natthe socati kilamati paridevati, urattalim kandati, sammoham apajjati.
an5.48:3.7: ‘assutava puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena attanamyeva paritapeti’.
an5.48:4.1: Sutavato ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa jaradhammam jirati.
an5.48:4.3: ‘na kho mayhevekassa jaradhammam jirati, atha kho yavata sattanam agati gati cuti upapatti sabbesam sattanam jaradhammam jirati.
an5.48:4.4: Ahanceva kho pana jaradhamme jinne soceyyam kilameyyam parideveyyam, urattalim kandeyyam, sammoham apajjeyyam, bhattampi me nacchadeyya, kayepi dubbanniyam okkameyya, kammantapi nappavatteyyum, amittapi attamana assu, mittapi dummana assu’ti.
an5.48:4.5: So jaradhamme jinne na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattalim kandati, na sammoham apajjati.
an5.48:4.7: ‘sutava ariyasavako abbuhi savisam sokasallam, yena viddho assutava puthujjano attanamyeva paritapeti.
an5.48:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sutavato ariyasavakassa byadhidhammam byadhiyati …pe… maranadhammam miyati … khayadhammam khiyati … nassanadhammam nassati.
an5.48:5.3: ‘na kho mayhevekassa nassanadhammam nassati, atha kho yavata sattanam agati gati cuti upapatti sabbesam sattanam nassanadhammam nassati.
an5.48:5.4: Ahanceva kho pana nassanadhamme natthe soceyyam kilameyyam parideveyyam, urattalim kandeyyam, sammoham apajjeyyam, bhattampi me nacchadeyya, kayepi dubbanniyam okkameyya, kammantapi nappavatteyyum, amittapi attamana assu, mittapi dummana assu’ti.
an5.48:5.5: So nassanadhamme natthe na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattalim kandati, na sammoham apajjati.
an5.48:5.7: ‘sutava ariyasavako abbuhi savisam sokasallam, yena viddho assutava puthujjano attanamyeva paritapeti.
an5.48:6.1: Imani kho, bhikkhave, panca alabbhaniyani thanani samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasminti.
